import java.io.File
import java.util.ArrayDeque

fun parseLine(line: String): Triple<String, List<List<Int>>, List<Int>> {
    val l = line.trim()
    val m = Regex("\\s*\\[([^\\]]+)\\]\\s*(.*)\\{([^\\}]*)\\}\\s*").matchEntire(l)
        ?: throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot parse line: $line")
    val pattern = m.groupValues[1]
    val middle = m.groupValues[2]
    val joltsStr = m.groupValues[3].trim()
    val buttons = mutableListOf<List<Int>>()
    val par = Regex("\\(([^\\)]*)\\)")
    for (mt in par.findAll(middle)) {
        val s = mt.groupValues[1].trim()
        if (s.isEmpty()) buttons.add(emptyList()) else buttons.add(s.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() })
    }
    val joltages = if (joltsStr.isEmpty()) emptyList() else joltsStr.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() }
    return Triple(pattern, buttons, joltages)
}

fun mitmMinPresses(pattern: String, buttons: List<List<Int>>): Int {
    val m = pattern.length
    var target = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (pattern[i] == '#') target = target or (1 shl i)
    val masks = IntArray(buttons.size)
    for (i in buttons.indices) {
        var mask = 0
        for (idx in buttons[i]) if (idx in 0 until m) mask = mask xor (1 shl idx)
        masks[i] = mask
    }
    val n = masks.size
    val k = n / 2
    val left = masks.sliceArray(0 until k)
    val right = masks.sliceArray(k until n)
    val mapR = HashMap<Int, Int>()
    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

private class CompSolver(private val masks: IntArray, private val rowsOf: Array<IntArray>, private val targets: IntArray) {
    private val n = masks.size
    private val m = targets.size
    private val M = 1 shl m
    private val capsSuffix: Array<IntArray> = Array(n + 1) { IntArray(M) }
    private val ct: Array<IntArray> = Array(n) { IntArray(M) }
    private val sumT: IntArray = IntArray(M)
    private val rem: IntArray = targets.clone()
    private var best = Int.MAX_VALUE

    init {
        // caps suffix and ct
        for (d in n - 1 downTo 0) {
            val cur = capsSuffix[d]
            val nxt = capsSuffix[d + 1]
            val maskB = masks[d]
            for (T in 1 until M) {
                val cov = Integer.bitCount(maskB and T)
                val v = nxt[T]
                cur[T] = if (cov > v) cov else v
            }
        }
        for (b in 0 until n) {
            val mb = masks[b]
            for (T in 1 until M) ct[b][T] = Integer.bitCount(mb and T)
        }
        // sumT initial
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            var s = 0
            var t = T
            var i = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) s += targets[i]
                t = t ushr 1
                i++
            }
            sumT[T] = s
        }
    }

    private fun allZero(): Boolean { for (x in rem) if (x != 0) return false; return true }

    private fun lb(depth: Int): Int {
        val cap = capsSuffix[depth]
        var bestLb = 0
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val s = sumT[T]
            if (s == 0) continue
            val c = cap[T]
            if (c == 0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
            val need = (s + c - 1) / c
            if (need > bestLb) bestLb = need
        }
        return bestLb
    }

    private fun apply(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] -= k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] -= c * k
        }
    }
    private fun undo(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] += k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] += c * k
        }
    }

    private fun dfs(depth: Int, used: Int) {
        if (used >= best) return
        if (allZero()) { if (used < best) best = used; return }
        val h = lb(depth)
        if (h == Int.MAX_VALUE) return
        if (used + h >= best) return
        if (depth == n) return
        // upper bound for this button
        var ub = Int.MAX_VALUE
        for (r in rowsOf[depth]) if (rem[r] < ub) ub = rem[r]
        if (ub == Int.MAX_VALUE) ub = 0
        var k = ub
        while (k >= 0) {
            apply(depth, k)
            dfs(depth + 1, used + k)
            undo(depth, k)
            k--
        }
    }

    fun solve(): Int { best = Int.MAX_VALUE; dfs(0, 0); return best }
}

fun solveMachinePart2(buttonsOrig: List<List<Int>>, targetsOrig: IntArray): Int {
    val m0 = targetsOrig.size
    val n0 = buttonsOrig.size
    if (m0 == 0) return 0
    // Build cover matrix
    val cover = Array(n0) { BooleanArray(m0) }
    for (b in 0 until n0) for (idx in buttonsOrig[b]) if (idx in 0 until m0) cover[b][idx] = true
    // Group rows by signature over buttons
    val sigToRows = LinkedHashMap<Long, MutableList<Int>>()
    for (i in 0 until m0) {
        var sig = 0L
        for (b in 0 until n0) if (cover[b][i]) sig = sig or (1L shl b)
        sigToRows.computeIfAbsent(sig) { ArrayList() }.add(i)
    }
    val m = sigToRows.size
    val classTargets = IntArray(m)
    val sigList = ArrayList<Long>(m)
    var ci = 0
    for ((sig, rows) in sigToRows) {
        sigList.add(sig)
        val t0 = targetsOrig[rows[0]]
        for (r in rows) if (targetsOrig[r] != t0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        classTargets[ci] = t0
        ci++
    }
    // Forbid buttons touching zero-target classes
    var forbid = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] == 0) forbid = forbid or (1 shl i)
    // Build button masks over classes, keep those not touching forbidden
    val maskList = ArrayList<Int>()
    val rowsList = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (b in 0 until n0) {
        var msk = 0
        for ((idxSig, sig) in sigList.withIndex()) if (((sig ushr b) and 1L) != 0L) msk = msk or (1 shl idxSig)
        if (msk == 0) continue
        if ((msk and forbid) != 0) continue
        val list = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var j = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) list.add(j); t = t ushr 1; j++ }
        maskList.add(msk)
        rowsList.add(list.toIntArray())
    }
    // Feasibility: every positive class must be coverable
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] > 0) {
        var any = false
        for (msk in maskList) if (((msk ushr i) and 1) != 0) { any = true; break }
        if (!any) return Int.MAX_VALUE
    }
    if (maskList.isEmpty()) return if (classTargets.all { it == 0 }) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
    // Merge duplicate masks
    val seen = LinkedHashMap<Int, Int>()
    val mergedM = ArrayList<Int>()
    val mergedR = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (idxBtn in maskList.indices) {
        val msk = maskList[idxBtn]
        if (!seen.containsKey(msk)) { seen[msk] = mergedM.size; mergedM.add(msk); mergedR.add(rowsList[idxBtn]) }
    }
    // Build connectivity among classes
    val adj = Array(m) { ArrayList<Int>() }
    for (msk in mergedM) {
        val bits = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var i = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) bits.add(i); t = t ushr 1; i++ }
        for (a in 0 until bits.size) for (b in a + 1 until bits.size) { val u = bits[a]; val v = bits[b]; adj[u].add(v); adj[v].add(u) }
    }
    // BFS components
    val comp = IntArray(m) { -1 }
    var comps = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == -1) {
        val q = ArrayDeque<Int>()
        q.add(i)
        comp[i] = comps
        while (q.isNotEmpty()) {
            val u = q.removeFirst()
            for (v in adj[u]) if (comp[v] == -1) { comp[v] = comps; q.add(v) }
        }
        comps++
    }
    var total = 0
    for (c in 0 until comps) {
        val idxMap = HashMap<Int, Int>()
        var mc = 0
        for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == c) { idxMap[i] = mc; mc++ }
        val targ = IntArray(mc)
        for ((oi, ni) in idxMap) targ[ni] = classTargets[oi]
        val masksC = ArrayList<Int>()
        val rowsC = ArrayList<IntArray>()
        for (mi in mergedM.indices) {
            val mask = mergedM[mi]
            var ok = true
            var t = mask
            var iBit = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) if (comp[iBit] != c) { ok = false; break }
                t = t ushr 1
                iBit++
            }
            if (!ok) continue
            var newMask = 0
            val list = ArrayList<Int>()
            var tt = mask
            var ii = 0
            while (tt != 0) {
                if ((tt and 1) != 0) { val ni = idxMap[ii]!!; newMask = newMask or (1 shl ni); list.add(ni) }
                tt = tt ushr 1
                ii++
            }
            masksC.add(newMask)
            rowsC.add(list.toIntArray())
        }
        val order = (0 until masksC.size).sortedByDescending { Integer.bitCount(masksC[it]) }
        val masksArr = IntArray(order.size)
        val rowsArr = Array(order.size) { IntArray(0) }
        for (k in order.indices) { masksArr[k] = masksC[order[k]]; rowsArr[k] = rowsC[order[k]] }
        val solver = CompSolver(masksArr, rowsArr, targ)
        val ans = solver.solve()
        if (ans == Int.MAX_VALUE) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        total += ans
    }
    return total
}

fun main() {
    val lines = File("input.txt").readText().trim().lines().filter { it.isNotBlank() }
    // chunk.txt format: start end (0-based inclusive indices). If missing, process all.
    var start = 0
    var end = lines.size - 1
    val cf = File("chunk.txt")
    if (cf.exists()) {
        val parts = cf.readText().trim().split(Regex("\\s+"))
        if (parts.size >= 2) {
            start = parts[0].toInt()
            end = parts[1].toInt()
        }
    }
    if (start < 0) start = 0
    if (end >= lines.size) end = lines.size - 1
    var total1 = 0
    var total2 = 0
    for (i in start..end) {
        val line = lines[i]
        val (pattern, buttons, jolts) = parseLine(line)
        total1 += mitmMinPresses(pattern, buttons)
        total2 += solveMachinePart2(buttons, jolts.toIntArray())
    }
    println("part1_chunk=$total1 part2_chunk=$total2 range=$start-$end")
    File("accum.txt").appendText("$start $end $total1 $total2\n")
}

private class CompSolver(private val masks: IntArray, private val rowsOf: Array<IntArray>, private val targets: IntArray) {
    private val n = masks.size
    private val m = targets.size
    private val M = 1 shl m
    private val capsSuffix: Array<IntArray> = Array(n + 1) { IntArray(M) }
    private val ct: Array<IntArray> = Array(n) { IntArray(M) }
    private val sumT: IntArray = IntArray(M)
    private val rem: IntArray = targets.clone()
    private var best = Int.MAX_VALUE

    init {
        // caps suffix and ct
        for (d in n - 1 downTo 0) {
            val cur = capsSuffix[d]
            val nxt = capsSuffix[d + 1]
            val maskB = masks[d]
            for (T in 1 until M) {
                val cov = Integer.bitCount(maskB and T)
                val v = nxt[T]
                cur[T] = if (cov > v) cov else v
            }
        }
        for (b in 0 until n) {
            val mb = masks[b]
            for (T in 1 until M) ct[b][T] = Integer.bitCount(mb and T)
        }
        // sumT initial
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            var s = 0
            var t = T
            var i = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) s += targets[i]
                t = t ushr 1
                i++
            }
            sumT[T] = s
        }
    }

    private fun allZero(): Boolean { for (x in rem) if (x != 0) return false; return true }

    private fun lb(depth: Int): Int {
        val cap = capsSuffix[depth]
        var bestLb = 0
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val s = sumT[T]
            if (s == 0) continue
            val c = cap[T]
            if (c == 0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
            val need = (s + c - 1) / c
            if (need > bestLb) bestLb = need
        }
        return bestLb
    }

    private fun apply(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] -= k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] -= c * k
        }
    }
    private fun undo(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] += k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] += c * k
        }
    }

    private fun dfs(depth: Int, used: Int) {
        if (used >= best) return
        if (allZero()) { if (used < best) best = used; return }
        val h = lb(depth)
        if (h == Int.MAX_VALUE) return
        if (used + h >= best) return
        if (depth == n) return
        // upper bound for this button
        var ub = Int.MAX_VALUE
        for (r in rowsOf[depth]) if (rem[r] < ub) ub = rem[r]
        if (ub == Int.MAX_VALUE) ub = 0
        var k = ub
        while (k >= 0) {
            apply(depth, k)
            dfs(depth + 1, used + k)
            undo(depth, k)
            k--
        }
    }

    fun solve(): Int { best = Int.MAX_VALUE; dfs(0, 0); return best }
}

fun solveMachinePart2(buttonsOrig: List<List<Int>>, targetsOrig: IntArray): Int {
    val m0 = targetsOrig.size
    val n0 = buttonsOrig.size
    if (m0 == 0) return 0
    // Build cover matrix
    val cover = Array(n0) { BooleanArray(m0) }
    for (b in 0 until n0) for (idx in buttonsOrig[b]) if (idx in 0 until m0) cover[b][idx] = true
    // Group rows by signature over buttons
    val sigToRows = LinkedHashMap<Long, MutableList<Int>>()
    for (i in 0 until m0) {
        var sig = 0L
        for (b in 0 until n0) if (cover[b][i]) sig = sig or (1L shl b)
        sigToRows.computeIfAbsent(sig) { ArrayList() }.add(i)
    }
    val m = sigToRows.size
    val classTargets = IntArray(m)
    val sigList = ArrayList<Long>(m)
    var ci = 0
    for ((sig, rows) in sigToRows) {
        sigList.add(sig)
        val t0 = targetsOrig[rows[0]]
        for (r in rows) if (targetsOrig[r] != t0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        classTargets[ci] = t0
        ci++
    }
    // Forbid buttons touching zero-target classes
    var forbid = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] == 0) forbid = forbid or (1 shl i)
    // Build button masks over classes, keep those not touching forbidden
    val maskList = ArrayList<Int>()
    val rowsList = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (b in 0 until n0) {
        var msk = 0
        for ((idxSig, sig) in sigList.withIndex()) if (((sig ushr b) and 1L) != 0L) msk = msk or (1 shl idxSig)
        if (msk == 0) continue
        if ((msk and forbid) != 0) continue
        val list = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var j = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) list.add(j); t = t ushr 1; j++ }
        maskList.add(msk)
        rowsList.add(list.toIntArray())
    }
    // Feasibility: every positive class must be coverable
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] > 0) {
        var any = false
        for (msk in maskList) if (((msk ushr i) and 1) != 0) { any = true; break }
        if (!any) return Int.MAX_VALUE
    }
    if (maskList.isEmpty()) return if (classTargets.all { it == 0 }) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
    // Merge duplicate masks
    val seen = LinkedHashMap<Int, Int>()
    val mergedM = ArrayList<Int>()
    val mergedR = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (idxBtn in maskList.indices) {
        val msk = maskList[idxBtn]
        if (!seen.containsKey(msk)) { seen[msk] = mergedM.size; mergedM.add(msk); mergedR.add(rowsList[idxBtn]) }
    }
    // Build connectivity among classes
    val adj = Array(m) { ArrayList<Int>() }
    for (msk in mergedM) {
        val bits = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var i = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) bits.add(i); t = t ushr 1; i++ }
        for (a in 0 until bits.size) for (b in a + 1 until bits.size) { val u = bits[a]; val v = bits[b]; adj[u].add(v); adj[v].add(u) }
    }
    // BFS components
    val comp = IntArray(m) { -1 }
    var comps = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == -1) {
        val q = ArrayDeque<Int>()
        q.add(i)
        comp[i] = comps
        while (q.isNotEmpty()) {
            val u = q.removeFirst()
            for (v in adj[u]) if (comp[v] == -1) { comp[v] = comps; q.add(v) }
        }
        comps++
    }
    var total = 0
    for (c in 0 until comps) {
        val idxMap = HashMap<Int, Int>()
        var mc = 0
        for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == c) { idxMap[i] = mc; mc++ }
        val targ = IntArray(mc)
        for ((oi, ni) in idxMap) targ[ni] = classTargets[oi]
        val masksC = ArrayList<Int>()
        val rowsC = ArrayList<IntArray>()
        for (mi in mergedM.indices) {
            val mask = mergedM[mi]
            var ok = true
            var t = mask
            var iBit = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) if (comp[iBit] != c) { ok = false; break }
                t = t ushr 1
                iBit++
            }
            if (!ok) continue
            var newMask = 0
            val list = ArrayList<Int>()
            var tt = mask
            var ii = 0
            while (tt != 0) {
                if ((tt and 1) != 0) { val ni = idxMap[ii]!!; newMask = newMask or (1 shl ni); list.add(ni) }
                tt = tt ushr 1
                ii++
            }
            masksC.add(newMask)
            rowsC.add(list.toIntArray())
        }
        val order = (0 until masksC.size).sortedByDescending { Integer.bitCount(masksC[it]) }
        val masksArr = IntArray(order.size)
        val rowsArr = Array(order.size) { IntArray(0) }
        for (k in order.indices) { masksArr[k] = masksC[order[k]]; rowsArr[k] = rowsC[order[k]] }
        val solver = CompSolver(masksArr, rowsArr, targ)
        val ans = solver.solve()
        if (ans == Int.MAX_VALUE) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        total += ans
    }
    return total
}

fun main() {
    val lines = File("input.txt").readText().trim().lines().filter { it.isNotBlank() }
    // chunk.txt format: start end (0-based inclusive indices). If missing, process all.
    var start = 0
    var end = lines.size - 1
    val cf = File("chunk.txt")
    if (cf.exists()) {
        val parts = cf.readText().trim().split(Regex("\\s+"))
        if (parts.size >= 2) {
            start = parts[0].toInt()
            end = parts[1].toInt()
        }
    }
    if (start < 0) start = 0
    if (end >= lines.size) end = lines.size - 1
    var total1 = 0
    var total2 = 0
    for (i in start..end) {
        val line = lines[i]
        val (pattern, buttons, jolts) = parseLine(line)
        total1 += mitmMinPresses(pattern, buttons)
        total2 += solveMachinePart2(buttons, jolts.toIntArray())
    }
    println("part1_chunk=$total1 part2_chunk=$total2 range=$start-$end")
    File("accum.txt").appendText("$start $end $total1 $total2\n")
}

import java.io.File
import java.util.ArrayDeque

fun parseLine(line: String): Triple<String, List<List<Int>>, List<Int>> {
    val l = line.trim()
    val m = Regex("\\s*\\[([^\\]]+)\\]\\s*(.*)\\{([^\\}]*)\\}\\s*").matchEntire(l)
        ?: throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot parse line: $line")
    val pattern = m.groupValues[1]
    val middle = m.groupValues[2]
    val joltsStr = m.groupValues[3].trim()
    val buttons = mutableListOf<List<Int>>()
    val par = Regex("\\(([^\\)]*)\\)")
    for (mt in par.findAll(middle)) {
        val s = mt.groupValues[1].trim()
        if (s.isEmpty()) buttons.add(emptyList()) else buttons.add(s.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() })
    }
    val joltages = if (joltsStr.isEmpty()) emptyList() else joltsStr.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() }
    return Triple(pattern, buttons, joltages)
}

fun mitmMinPresses(pattern: String, buttons: List<List<Int>>): Int {
    val m = pattern.length
    var target = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (pattern[i] == '#') target = target or (1 shl i)
    val masks = IntArray(buttons.size)
    for (i in buttons.indices) {
        var mask = 0
        for (idx in buttons[i]) if (idx in 0 until m) mask = mask xor (1 shl idx)
        masks[i] = mask
    }
    val n = masks.size
    val k = n / 2
    val left = masks.sliceArray(0 until k)
    val right = masks.sliceArray(k until n)
    val mapR = HashMap<Int, Int>()
    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

private class CompSolver(private val masks: IntArray, private val rowsOf: Array<IntArray>, private val targets: IntArray) {
    private val n = masks.size
    private val m = targets.size
    private val M = 1 shl m
    private val capsSuffix: Array<IntArray> = Array(n + 1) { IntArray(M) }
    private val ct: Array<IntArray> = Array(n) { IntArray(M) }
    private val sumT: IntArray = IntArray(M)
    private val rem: IntArray = targets.clone()
    private var best = Int.MAX_VALUE

    init {
        // caps suffix and ct
        for (d in n - 1 downTo 0) {
            val cur = capsSuffix[d]
            val nxt = capsSuffix[d + 1]
            val maskB = masks[d]
            for (T in 1 until M) {
                val cov = Integer.bitCount(maskB and T)
                val v = nxt[T]
                cur[T] = if (cov > v) cov else v
            }
        }
        for (b in 0 until n) {
            val mb = masks[b]
            for (T in 1 until M) ct[b][T] = Integer.bitCount(mb and T)
        }
        // sumT initial
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            var s = 0
            var t = T
            var i = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) s += targets[i]
                t = t ushr 1
                i++
            }
            sumT[T] = s
        }
    }

    private fun allZero(): Boolean { for (x in rem) if (x != 0) return false; return true }

    private fun lb(depth: Int): Int {
        val cap = capsSuffix[depth]
        var bestLb = 0
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val s = sumT[T]
            if (s == 0) continue
            val c = cap[T]
            if (c == 0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
            val need = (s + c - 1) / c
            if (need > bestLb) bestLb = need
        }
        return bestLb
    }

    private fun apply(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] -= k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] -= c * k
        }
    }
    private fun undo(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] += k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] += c * k
        }
    }

    private fun dfs(depth: Int, used: Int) {
        if (used >= best) return
        if (allZero()) { if (used < best) best = used; return }
        val h = lb(depth)
        if (h == Int.MAX_VALUE) return
        if (used + h >= best) return
        if (depth == n) return
        // upper bound for this button
        var ub = Int.MAX_VALUE
        for (r in rowsOf[depth]) if (rem[r] < ub) ub = rem[r]
        if (ub == Int.MAX_VALUE) ub = 0
        var k = ub
        while (k >= 0) {
            apply(depth, k)
            dfs(depth + 1, used + k)
            undo(depth, k)
            k--
        }
    }

    fun solve(): Int { best = Int.MAX_VALUE; dfs(0, 0); return best }
}

fun solveMachinePart2(buttonsOrig: List<List<Int>>, targetsOrig: IntArray): Int {
    val m0 = targetsOrig.size
    val n0 = buttonsOrig.size
    if (m0 == 0) return 0
    // Build cover matrix
    val cover = Array(n0) { BooleanArray(m0) }
    for (b in 0 until n0) for (idx in buttonsOrig[b]) if (idx in 0 until m0) cover[b][idx] = true
    // Group rows by signature over buttons
    val sigToRows = LinkedHashMap<Long, MutableList<Int>>()
    for (i in 0 until m0) {
        var sig = 0L
        for (b in 0 until n0) if (cover[b][i]) sig = sig or (1L shl b)
        sigToRows.computeIfAbsent(sig) { ArrayList() }.add(i)
    }
    val m = sigToRows.size
    val classTargets = IntArray(m)
    val sigList = ArrayList<Long>(m)
    var ci = 0
    for ((sig, rows) in sigToRows) {
        sigList.add(sig)
        val t0 = targetsOrig[rows[0]]
        for (r in rows) if (targetsOrig[r] != t0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        classTargets[ci] = t0
        ci++
    }
    // Forbid buttons touching zero-target classes
    var forbid = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] == 0) forbid = forbid or (1 shl i)
    // Build button masks over classes, keep those not touching forbidden
    val maskList = ArrayList<Int>()
    val rowsList = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (b in 0 until n0) {
        var msk = 0
        for ((idxSig, sig) in sigList.withIndex()) if (((sig ushr b) and 1L) != 0L) msk = msk or (1 shl idxSig)
        if (msk == 0) continue
        if ((msk and forbid) != 0) continue
        val list = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var j = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) list.add(j); t = t ushr 1; j++ }
        maskList.add(msk)
        rowsList.add(list.toIntArray())
    }
    // Feasibility: every positive class must be coverable
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] > 0) {
        var any = false
        for (msk in maskList) if (((msk ushr i) and 1) != 0) { any = true; break }
        if (!any) return Int.MAX_VALUE
    }
    if (maskList.isEmpty()) return if (classTargets.all { it == 0 }) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
    // Merge duplicate masks
    val seen = LinkedHashMap<Int, Int>()
    val mergedM = ArrayList<Int>()
    val mergedR = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (idxBtn in maskList.indices) {
        val msk = maskList[idxBtn]
        if (!seen.containsKey(msk)) { seen[msk] = mergedM.size; mergedM.add(msk); mergedR.add(rowsList[idxBtn]) }
    }
    // Build connectivity among classes
    val adj = Array(m) { ArrayList<Int>() }
    for (msk in mergedM) {
        val bits = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var i = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) bits.add(i); t = t ushr 1; i++ }
        for (a in 0 until bits.size) for (b in a + 1 until bits.size) { val u = bits[a]; val v = bits[b]; adj[u].add(v); adj[v].add(u) }
    }
    // BFS components
    val comp = IntArray(m) { -1 }
    var comps = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == -1) {
        val q = ArrayDeque<Int>()
        q.add(i)
        comp[i] = comps
        while (q.isNotEmpty()) {
            val u = q.removeFirst()
            for (v in adj[u]) if (comp[v] == -1) { comp[v] = comps; q.add(v) }
        }
        comps++
    }
    var total = 0
    for (c in 0 until comps) {
        val idxMap = HashMap<Int, Int>()
        var mc = 0
        for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == c) { idxMap[i] = mc; mc++ }
        val targ = IntArray(mc)
        for ((oi, ni) in idxMap) targ[ni] = classTargets[oi]
        val masksC = ArrayList<Int>()
        val rowsC = ArrayList<IntArray>()
        for (mi in mergedM.indices) {
            val mask = mergedM[mi]
            var ok = true
            var t = mask
            var iBit = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) if (comp[iBit] != c) { ok = false; break }
                t = t ushr 1
                iBit++
            }
            if (!ok) continue
            var newMask = 0
            val list = ArrayList<Int>()
            var tt = mask
            var ii = 0
            while (tt != 0) {
                if ((tt and 1) != 0) { val ni = idxMap[ii]!!; newMask = newMask or (1 shl ni); list.add(ni) }
                tt = tt ushr 1
                ii++
            }
            masksC.add(newMask)
            rowsC.add(list.toIntArray())
        }
        val order = (0 until masksC.size).sortedByDescending { Integer.bitCount(masksC[it]) }
        val masksArr = IntArray(order.size)
        val rowsArr = Array(order.size) { IntArray(0) }
        for (k in order.indices) { masksArr[k] = masksC[order[k]]; rowsArr[k] = rowsC[order[k]] }
        val solver = CompSolver(masksArr, rowsArr, targ)
        val ans = solver.solve()
        if (ans == Int.MAX_VALUE) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        total += ans
    }
    return total
}

fun main() {
    val lines = File("input.txt").readText().trim().lines().filter { it.isNotBlank() }
    // chunk.txt format: start end (0-based inclusive indices). If missing, process all.
    var start = 0
    var end = lines.size - 1
    val cf = File("chunk.txt")
    if (cf.exists()) {
        val parts = cf.readText().trim().split(Regex("\\s+"))
        if (parts.size >= 2) {
            start = parts[0].toInt()
            end = parts[1].toInt()
        }
    }
    if (start < 0) start = 0
    if (end >= lines.size) end = lines.size - 1
    var total1 = 0
    var total2 = 0
    for (i in start..end) {
        val line = lines[i]
        val (pattern, buttons, jolts) = parseLine(line)
        total1 += mitmMinPresses(pattern, buttons)
        total2 += solveMachinePart2(buttons, jolts.toIntArray())
    }
    println("part1_chunk=$total1 part2_chunk=$total2 range=$start-$end")
    File("accum.txt").appendText("$start $end $total1 $total2\n")
}

import java.io.File
import java.util.ArrayDeque

fun parseLine(line: String): Triple<String, List<List<Int>>, List<Int>> {
    val l = line.trim()
    val m = Regex("\\s*\\[([^\\]]+)\\]\\s*(.*)\\{([^\\}]*)\\}\\s*").matchEntire(l)
        ?: throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot parse line: $line")
    val pattern = m.groupValues[1]
    val middle = m.groupValues[2]
    val joltsStr = m.groupValues[3].trim()
    val buttons = mutableListOf<List<Int>>()
    val par = Regex("\\(([^\\)]*)\\)")
    for (mt in par.findAll(middle)) {
        val s = mt.groupValues[1].trim()
        if (s.isEmpty()) buttons.add(emptyList()) else buttons.add(s.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() })
    }
    val joltages = if (joltsStr.isEmpty()) emptyList() else joltsStr.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() }
    return Triple(pattern, buttons, joltages)
}

fun mitmMinPresses(pattern: String, buttons: List<List<Int>>): Int {
    val m = pattern.length
    var target = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (pattern[i] == '#') target = target or (1 shl i)
    val masks = IntArray(buttons.size)
    for (i in buttons.indices) {
        var mask = 0
        for (idx in buttons[i]) if (idx in 0 until m) mask = mask xor (1 shl idx)
        masks[i] = mask
    }
    val n = masks.size
    val k = n / 2
    val left = masks.sliceArray(0 until k)
    val right = masks.sliceArray(k until n)
    val mapR = HashMap<Int, Int>()
    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

private class CompSolver(private val masks: IntArray, private val rowsOf: Array<IntArray>, private val targets: IntArray) {
    private val n = masks.size
    private val m = targets.size
    private val M = 1 shl m
    private val capsSuffix: Array<IntArray> = Array(n + 1) { IntArray(M) }
    private val ct: Array<IntArray> = Array(n) { IntArray(M) }
    private val sumT: IntArray = IntArray(M)
    private val rem: IntArray = targets.clone()
    private var best = Int.MAX_VALUE

    init {
        // caps suffix and ct
        for (d in n - 1 downTo 0) {
            val cur = capsSuffix[d]
            val nxt = capsSuffix[d + 1]
            val maskB = masks[d]
            for (T in 1 until M) {
                val cov = Integer.bitCount(maskB and T)
                val v = nxt[T]
                cur[T] = if (cov > v) cov else v
            }
        }
        for (b in 0 until n) {
            val mb = masks[b]
            for (T in 1 until M) ct[b][T] = Integer.bitCount(mb and T)
        }
        // sumT initial
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            var s = 0
            var t = T
            var i = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) s += targets[i]
                t = t ushr 1
                i++
            }
            sumT[T] = s
        }
    }

    private fun allZero(): Boolean { for (x in rem) if (x != 0) return false; return true }

    private fun lb(depth: Int): Int {
        val cap = capsSuffix[depth]
        var bestLb = 0
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val s = sumT[T]
            if (s == 0) continue
            val c = cap[T]
            if (c == 0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
            val need = (s + c - 1) / c
            if (need > bestLb) bestLb = need
        }
        return bestLb
    }

    private fun apply(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] -= k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] -= c * k
        }
    }
    private fun undo(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] += k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] += c * k
        }
    }

    private fun dfs(depth: Int, used: Int) {
        if (used >= best) return
        if (allZero()) { if (used < best) best = used; return }
        val h = lb(depth)
        if (h == Int.MAX_VALUE) return
        if (used + h >= best) return
        if (depth == n) return
        // upper bound for this button
        var ub = Int.MAX_VALUE
        for (r in rowsOf[depth]) if (rem[r] < ub) ub = rem[r]
        if (ub == Int.MAX_VALUE) ub = 0
        var k = ub
        while (k >= 0) {
            apply(depth, k)
            dfs(depth + 1, used + k)
            undo(depth, k)
            k--
        }
    }

    fun solve(): Int { best = Int.MAX_VALUE; dfs(0, 0); return best }
}

fun solveMachinePart2(buttonsOrig: List<List<Int>>, targetsOrig: IntArray): Int {
    val m0 = targetsOrig.size
    val n0 = buttonsOrig.size
    if (m0 == 0) return 0
    // Build cover matrix
    val cover = Array(n0) { BooleanArray(m0) }
    for (b in 0 until n0) for (idx in buttonsOrig[b]) if (idx in 0 until m0) cover[b][idx] = true
    // Group rows by signature over buttons
    val sigToRows = LinkedHashMap<Long, MutableList<Int>>()
    for (i in 0 until m0) {
        var sig = 0L
        for (b in 0 until n0) if (cover[b][i]) sig = sig or (1L shl b)
        sigToRows.computeIfAbsent(sig) { ArrayList() }.add(i)
    }
    val m = sigToRows.size
    val classTargets = IntArray(m)
    val sigList = ArrayList<Long>(m)
    var ci = 0
    for ((sig, rows) in sigToRows) {
        sigList.add(sig)
        val t0 = targetsOrig[rows[0]]
        for (r in rows) if (targetsOrig[r] != t0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        classTargets[ci] = t0
        ci++
    }
    // Forbid buttons touching zero-target classes
    var forbid = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] == 0) forbid = forbid or (1 shl i)
    // Build button masks over classes, keep those not touching forbidden
    val maskList = ArrayList<Int>()
    val rowsList = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (b in 0 until n0) {
        var msk = 0
        for ((idxSig, sig) in sigList.withIndex()) if (((sig ushr b) and 1L) != 0L) msk = msk or (1 shl idxSig)
        if (msk == 0) continue
        if ((msk and forbid) != 0) continue
        val list = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var j = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) list.add(j); t = t ushr 1; j++ }
        maskList.add(msk)
        rowsList.add(list.toIntArray())
    }
    // Feasibility: every positive class must be coverable
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] > 0) {
        var any = false
        for (msk in maskList) if (((msk ushr i) and 1) != 0) { any = true; break }
        if (!any) return Int.MAX_VALUE
    }
    if (maskList.isEmpty()) return if (classTargets.all { it == 0 }) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
    // Merge duplicate masks
    val seen = LinkedHashMap<Int, Int>()
    val mergedM = ArrayList<Int>()
    val mergedR = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (idxBtn in maskList.indices) {
        val msk = maskList[idxBtn]
        if (!seen.containsKey(msk)) { seen[msk] = mergedM.size; mergedM.add(msk); mergedR.add(rowsList[idxBtn]) }
    }
    // Build connectivity among classes
    val adj = Array(m) { ArrayList<Int>() }
    for (msk in mergedM) {
        val bits = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var i = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) bits.add(i); t = t ushr 1; i++ }
        for (a in 0 until bits.size) for (b in a + 1 until bits.size) { val u = bits[a]; val v = bits[b]; adj[u].add(v); adj[v].add(u) }
    }
    // BFS components
    val comp = IntArray(m) { -1 }
    var comps = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == -1) {
        val q = ArrayDeque<Int>()
        q.add(i)
        comp[i] = comps
        while (q.isNotEmpty()) {
            val u = q.removeFirst()
            for (v in adj[u]) if (comp[v] == -1) { comp[v] = comps; q.add(v) }
        }
        comps++
    }
    var total = 0
    for (c in 0 until comps) {
        val idxMap = HashMap<Int, Int>()
        var mc = 0
        for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == c) { idxMap[i] = mc; mc++ }
        val targ = IntArray(mc)
        for ((oi, ni) in idxMap) targ[ni] = classTargets[oi]
        val masksC = ArrayList<Int>()
        val rowsC = ArrayList<IntArray>()
        for (mi in mergedM.indices) {
            val mask = mergedM[mi]
            var ok = true
            var t = mask
            var iBit = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) if (comp[iBit] != c) { ok = false; break }
                t = t ushr 1
                iBit++
            }
            if (!ok) continue
            var newMask = 0
            val list = ArrayList<Int>()
            var tt = mask
            var ii = 0
            while (tt != 0) {
                if ((tt and 1) != 0) { val ni = idxMap[ii]!!; newMask = newMask or (1 shl ni); list.add(ni) }
                tt = tt ushr 1
                ii++
            }
            masksC.add(newMask)
            rowsC.add(list.toIntArray())
        }
        val order = (0 until masksC.size).sortedByDescending { Integer.bitCount(masksC[it]) }
        val masksArr = IntArray(order.size)
        val rowsArr = Array(order.size) { IntArray(0) }
        for (k in order.indices) { masksArr[k] = masksC[order[k]]; rowsArr[k] = rowsC[order[k]] }
        val solver = CompSolver(masksArr, rowsArr, targ)
        val ans = solver.solve()
        if (ans == Int.MAX_VALUE) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        total += ans
    }
    return total
}

fun main() {
    val lines = File("input.txt").readText().trim().lines().filter { it.isNotBlank() }
    // chunk.txt format: start end (0-based inclusive indices). If missing, process all.
    var start = 0
    var end = lines.size - 1
    val cf = File("chunk.txt")
    if (cf.exists()) {
        val parts = cf.readText().trim().split(Regex("\\s+"))
        if (parts.size >= 2) {
            start = parts[0].toInt()
            end = parts[1].toInt()
        }
    }
    if (start < 0) start = 0
    if (end >= lines.size) end = lines.size - 1
    var total1 = 0
    var total2 = 0
    for (i in start..end) {
        val line = lines[i]
        val (pattern, buttons, jolts) = parseLine(line)
        total1 += mitmMinPresses(pattern, buttons)
        total2 += solveMachinePart2(buttons, jolts.toIntArray())
    }
    println("part1_chunk=$total1 part2_chunk=$total2 range=$start-$end")
    File("accum.txt").appendText("$start $end $total1 $total2\n")
}

import java.io.File
import java.util.ArrayDeque

fun parseLine(line: String): Triple<String, List<List<Int>>, List<Int>> {
    val l = line.trim()
    val m = Regex("\\s*\\[([^\\]]+)\\]\\s*(.*)\\{([^\\}]*)\\}\\s*").matchEntire(l)
        ?: throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot parse line: $line")
    val pattern = m.groupValues[1]
    val middle = m.groupValues[2]
    val joltsStr = m.groupValues[3].trim()
    val buttons = mutableListOf<List<Int>>()
    val par = Regex("\\(([^\\)]*)\\)")
    for (mt in par.findAll(middle)) {
        val s = mt.groupValues[1].trim()
        if (s.isEmpty()) buttons.add(emptyList()) else buttons.add(s.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() })
    }
    val joltages = if (joltsStr.isEmpty()) emptyList() else joltsStr.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() }
    return Triple(pattern, buttons, joltages)
}

    }
    val n = masks.size
    val k = n / 2
    val left = masks.sliceArray(0 until k)
    val right = masks.sliceArray(k until n)
    val mapR = HashMap<Int, Int>()
    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0

    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

private class CompSolver(private val masks: IntArray, private val rowsOf: Array<IntArray>, private val targets: IntArray) {
    private val n = masks.size
    private val m = targets.size
    private val M = 1 shl m
    private val capsSuffix: Array<IntArray> = Array(n + 1) { IntArray(M) }
    private val ct: Array<IntArray> = Array(n) { IntArray(M) }
    private val sumT: IntArray = IntArray(M)
    private val rem: IntArray = targets.clone()
    private var best = Int.MAX_VALUE

    init {
        // caps suffix and ct
        for (d in n - 1 downTo 0) {
            val cur = capsSuffix[d]
            val nxt = capsSuffix[d + 1]
            val maskB = masks[d]
            for (T in 1 until M) {
                val cov = Integer.bitCount(maskB and T)
                val v = nxt[T]
                cur[T] = if (cov > v) cov else v
            }
        }
        for (b in 0 until n) {
            val mb = masks[b]
            for (T in 1 until M) ct[b][T] = Integer.bitCount(mb and T)
        }
        // sumT initial
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            var s = 0
            var t = T
            var i = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) s += targets[i]
                t = t ushr 1
                i++
            }
            sumT[T] = s
        }
    }

    private fun allZero(): Boolean { for (x in rem) if (x != 0) return false; return true }

    private fun lb(depth: Int): Int {
        val cap = capsSuffix[depth]
        var bestLb = 0
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val s = sumT[T]
            if (s == 0) continue
            val c = cap[T]
            if (c == 0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
            val need = (s + c - 1) / c
            if (need > bestLb) bestLb = need
        }
        return bestLb
    }

    private fun apply(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] -= k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] -= c * k
        }
    }
    private fun undo(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] += k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] += c * k
        }
    }

    private fun dfs(depth: Int, used: Int) {
        if (used >= best) return
        if (allZero()) { if (used < best) best = used; return }
        val h = lb(depth)
        if (h == Int.MAX_VALUE) return
        if (used + h >= best) return
        if (depth == n) return
        // upper bound for this button
        var ub = Int.MAX_VALUE
        for (r in rowsOf[depth]) if (rem[r] < ub) ub = rem[r]
        if (ub == Int.MAX_VALUE) ub = 0
        var k = ub
        while (k >= 0) {
            apply(depth, k)
            dfs(depth + 1, used + k)
            undo(depth, k)
            k--
        }
    }

    fun solve(): Int { best = Int.MAX_VALUE; dfs(0, 0); return best }
}

fun solveMachinePart2(buttonsOrig: List<List<Int>>, targetsOrig: IntArray): Int {
    val m0 = targetsOrig.size
    val n0 = buttonsOrig.size
    if (m0 == 0) return 0
    // Build cover matrix
    val cover = Array(n0) { BooleanArray(m0) }
    for (b in 0 until n0) for (idx in buttonsOrig[b]) if (idx in 0 until m0) cover[b][idx] = true
    // Group rows by signature over buttons
    val sigToRows = LinkedHashMap<Long, MutableList<Int>>()
    for (i in 0 until m0) {
        var sig = 0L
        for (b in 0 until n0) if (cover[b][i]) sig = sig or (1L shl b)
        sigToRows.computeIfAbsent(sig) { ArrayList() }.add(i)
    }
    val m = sigToRows.size
    val classTargets = IntArray(m)
    val sigList = ArrayList<Long>(m)
    var ci = 0
    for ((sig, rows) in sigToRows) {
        sigList.add(sig)
        val t0 = targetsOrig[rows[0]]
        for (r in rows) if (targetsOrig[r] != t0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        classTargets[ci] = t0
        ci++
    }
    // Forbid buttons touching zero-target classes
    var forbid = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] == 0) forbid = forbid or (1 shl i)
    // Build button masks over classes, keep those not touching forbidden
    val maskList = ArrayList<Int>()
    val rowsList = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (b in 0 until n0) {
        var msk = 0
        for ((idxSig, sig) in sigList.withIndex()) if (((sig ushr b) and 1L) != 0L) msk = msk or (1 shl idxSig)
        if (msk == 0) continue
        if ((msk and forbid) != 0) continue
        val list = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var j = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) list.add(j); t = t ushr 1; j++ }
        maskList.add(msk)
        rowsList.add(list.toIntArray())
    }
    // Feasibility: every positive class must be coverable
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] > 0) {
        var any = false
        for (msk in maskList) if (((msk ushr i) and 1) != 0) { any = true; break }
        if (!any) return Int.MAX_VALUE
    }
    if (maskList.isEmpty()) return if (classTargets.all { it == 0 }) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
    // Merge duplicate masks
    val seen = LinkedHashMap<Int, Int>()
    val mergedM = ArrayList<Int>()
    val mergedR = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (idxBtn in maskList.indices) {
        val msk = maskList[idxBtn]
        if (!seen.containsKey(msk)) { seen[msk] = mergedM.size; mergedM.add(msk); mergedR.add(rowsList[idxBtn]) }
    }
    // Build connectivity among classes
    val adj = Array(m) { ArrayList<Int>() }
    for (msk in mergedM) {
        val bits = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var i = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) bits.add(i); t = t ushr 1; i++ }
        for (a in 0 until bits.size) for (b in a + 1 until bits.size) { val u = bits[a]; val v = bits[b]; adj[u].add(v); adj[v].add(u) }
    }
    // BFS components
    val comp = IntArray(m) { -1 }
    var comps = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == -1) {
        val q = ArrayDeque<Int>()
        q.add(i)
        comp[i] = comps
        while (q.isNotEmpty()) {
            val u = q.removeFirst()
            for (v in adj[u]) if (comp[v] == -1) { comp[v] = comps; q.add(v) }
        }
        comps++
    }
    var total = 0
    for (c in 0 until comps) {
        val idxMap = HashMap<Int, Int>()
        var mc = 0
        for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == c) { idxMap[i] = mc; mc++ }
        val targ = IntArray(mc)
        for ((oi, ni) in idxMap) targ[ni] = classTargets[oi]
        val masksC = ArrayList<Int>()
        val rowsC = ArrayList<IntArray>()
        for (mi in mergedM.indices) {
            val mask = mergedM[mi]
            var ok = true
            var t = mask
            var iBit = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) if (comp[iBit] != c) { ok = false; break }
                t = t ushr 1
                iBit++
            }
            if (!ok) continue
            var newMask = 0
            val list = ArrayList<Int>()
            var tt = mask
            var ii = 0
            while (tt != 0) {
                if ((tt and 1) != 0) { val ni = idxMap[ii]!!; newMask = newMask or (1 shl ni); list.add(ni) }
                tt = tt ushr 1
                ii++
            }
            masksC.add(newMask)
            rowsC.add(list.toIntArray())
        }
        val order = (0 until masksC.size).sortedByDescending { Integer.bitCount(masksC[it]) }
        val masksArr = IntArray(order.size)
        val rowsArr = Array(order.size) { IntArray(0) }
        for (k in order.indices) { masksArr[k] = masksC[order[k]]; rowsArr[k] = rowsC[order[k]] }
        val solver = CompSolver(masksArr, rowsArr, targ)
        val ans = solver.solve()
        if (ans == Int.MAX_VALUE) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        total += ans
    }
    return total
}

fun main() {
    val lines = File("input.txt").readText().trim().lines().filter { it.isNotBlank() }
    // chunk.txt format: start end (0-based inclusive indices). If missing, process all.
    var start = 0
    var end = lines.size - 1
    val cf = File("chunk.txt")
    if (cf.exists()) {
        val parts = cf.readText().trim().split(Regex("\\s+"))
        if (parts.size >= 2) {
            start = parts[0].toInt()
            end = parts[1].toInt()
        }
    }
    if (start < 0) start = 0
    if (end >= lines.size) end = lines.size - 1
    var total1 = 0
    var total2 = 0
    for (i in start..end) {
        val line = lines[i]
        val (pattern, buttons, jolts) = parseLine(line)
        total1 += mitmMinPresses(pattern, buttons)
        total2 += solveMachinePart2(buttons, jolts.toIntArray())
    }
    println("part1_chunk=$total1 part2_chunk=$total2 range=$start-$end")
    File("accum.txt").appendText("$start $end $total1 $total2\n")
}

import java.io.File
import java.util.ArrayDeque

fun parseLine(line: String): Triple<String, List<List<Int>>, List<Int>> {
    val l = line.trim()
    val m = Regex("\\s*\\[([^\\]]+)\\]\\s*(.*)\\{([^\\}]*)\\}\\s*").matchEntire(l)
        ?: throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot parse line: $line")
    val pattern = m.groupValues[1]
    val middle = m.groupValues[2]
    val joltsStr = m.groupValues[3].trim()
    val buttons = mutableListOf<List<Int>>()
    val par = Regex("\\(([^\\)]*)\\)")
    for (mt in par.findAll(middle)) {
        val s = mt.groupValues[1].trim()
        if (s.isEmpty()) buttons.add(emptyList()) else buttons.add(s.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() })
    }
    val joltages = if (joltsStr.isEmpty()) emptyList() else joltsStr.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() }
    return Triple(pattern, buttons, joltages)
}

fun mitmMinPresses(pattern: String, buttons: List<List<Int>>): Int {
    val m = pattern.length
    var target = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (pattern[i] == '#') target = target or (1 shl i)
    val masks = IntArray(buttons.size)
    for (i in buttons.indices) {
        var mask = 0
        for (idx in buttons[i]) if (idx in 0 until m) mask = mask xor (1 shl idx)
        masks[i] = mask
    }
    val n = masks.size
    val k = n / 2
    val left = masks.sliceArray(0 until k)
    val right = masks.sliceArray(k until n)
    val mapR = HashMap<Int, Int>()
    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

    val masks = IntArray(buttons.size)
    for (i in buttons.indices) {
        var mask = 0
        for (idx in buttons[i]) if (idx in 0 until m) mask = mask xor (1 shl idx)
        masks[i] = mask
    }
    val n = masks.size
    val k = n / 2
    val left = masks.sliceArray(0 until k)
    val right = masks.sliceArray(k until n)
    val mapR = HashMap<Int, Int>()
    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

private class CompSolver(private val masks: IntArray, private val rowsOf: Array<IntArray>, private val targets: IntArray) {
    private val n = masks.size
    private val m = targets.size
    private val M = 1 shl m
    private val capsSuffix: Array<IntArray> = Array(n + 1) { IntArray(M) }
    private val ct: Array<IntArray> = Array(n) { IntArray(M) }
    private val sumT: IntArray = IntArray(M)
    private val rem: IntArray = targets.clone()
    private var best = Int.MAX_VALUE

    init {
        // caps suffix and ct
        for (d in n - 1 downTo 0) {
            val cur = capsSuffix[d]
            val nxt = capsSuffix[d + 1]
            val maskB = masks[d]
            for (T in 1 until M) {
                val cov = Integer.bitCount(maskB and T)
                val v = nxt[T]
                cur[T] = if (cov > v) cov else v
            }
        }
        for (b in 0 until n) {
            val mb = masks[b]
            for (T in 1 until M) ct[b][T] = Integer.bitCount(mb and T)
        }
        // sumT initial
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            var s = 0
            var t = T
            var i = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) s += targets[i]
                t = t ushr 1
                i++
            }
            sumT[T] = s
        }
    }

    private fun allZero(): Boolean { for (x in rem) if (x != 0) return false; return true }

    private fun lb(depth: Int): Int {
        val cap = capsSuffix[depth]
        var bestLb = 0
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val s = sumT[T]
            if (s == 0) continue
            val c = cap[T]
            if (c == 0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
            val need = (s + c - 1) / c
            if (need > bestLb) bestLb = need
        }
        return bestLb
    }

    private fun apply(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] -= k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] -= c * k
        }
    }
    private fun undo(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] += k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] += c * k
        }
    }

    private fun dfs(depth: Int, used: Int) {
        if (used >= best) return
        if (allZero()) { if (used < best) best = used; return }
        val h = lb(depth)
        if (h == Int.MAX_VALUE) return
        if (used + h >= best) return
        if (depth == n) return
        // upper bound for this button
        var ub = Int.MAX_VALUE
        for (r in rowsOf[depth]) if (rem[r] < ub) ub = rem[r]
        if (ub == Int.MAX_VALUE) ub = 0
        var k = ub
        while (k >= 0) {
            apply(depth, k)
            dfs(depth + 1, used + k)
            undo(depth, k)
            k--
        }
    }

    fun solve(): Int { best = Int.MAX_VALUE; dfs(0, 0); return best }
}

fun solveMachinePart2(buttonsOrig: List<List<Int>>, targetsOrig: IntArray): Int {
    val m0 = targetsOrig.size
    val n0 = buttonsOrig.size
    if (m0 == 0) return 0
    // Build cover matrix
    val cover = Array(n0) { BooleanArray(m0) }
    for (b in 0 until n0) for (idx in buttonsOrig[b]) if (idx in 0 until m0) cover[b][idx] = true
    // Group rows by signature over buttons
    val sigToRows = LinkedHashMap<Long, MutableList<Int>>()
    for (i in 0 until m0) {
        var sig = 0L
        for (b in 0 until n0) if (cover[b][i]) sig = sig or (1L shl b)
        sigToRows.computeIfAbsent(sig) { ArrayList() }.add(i)
    }
    val m = sigToRows.size
    val classTargets = IntArray(m)
    val sigList = ArrayList<Long>(m)
    var ci = 0
    for ((sig, rows) in sigToRows) {
        sigList.add(sig)
        val t0 = targetsOrig[rows[0]]
        for (r in rows) if (targetsOrig[r] != t0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        classTargets[ci] = t0
        ci++
    }
    // Forbid buttons touching zero-target classes
    var forbid = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] == 0) forbid = forbid or (1 shl i)
    // Build button masks over classes, keep those not touching forbidden
    val maskList = ArrayList<Int>()
    val rowsList = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (b in 0 until n0) {
        var msk = 0
        for ((idxSig, sig) in sigList.withIndex()) if (((sig ushr b) and 1L) != 0L) msk = msk or (1 shl idxSig)
        if (msk == 0) continue
        if ((msk and forbid) != 0) continue
        val list = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var j = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) list.add(j); t = t ushr 1; j++ }
        maskList.add(msk)
        rowsList.add(list.toIntArray())
    }
    // Feasibility: every positive class must be coverable
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] > 0) {
        var any = false
        for (msk in maskList) if (((msk ushr i) and 1) != 0) { any = true; break }
        if (!any) return Int.MAX_VALUE
    }
    if (maskList.isEmpty()) return if (classTargets.all { it == 0 }) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
    // Merge duplicate masks
    val seen = LinkedHashMap<Int, Int>()
    val mergedM = ArrayList<Int>()
    val mergedR = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (idxBtn in maskList.indices) {
        val msk = maskList[idxBtn]
        if (!seen.containsKey(msk)) { seen[msk] = mergedM.size; mergedM.add(msk); mergedR.add(rowsList[idxBtn]) }
    }
    // Build connectivity among classes
    val adj = Array(m) { ArrayList<Int>() }
    for (msk in mergedM) {
        val bits = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var i = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) bits.add(i); t = t ushr 1; i++ }
        for (a in 0 until bits.size) for (b in a + 1 until bits.size) { val u = bits[a]; val v = bits[b]; adj[u].add(v); adj[v].add(u) }
    }
    // BFS components
    val comp = IntArray(m) { -1 }
    var comps = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == -1) {
        val q = ArrayDeque<Int>()
        q.add(i)
        comp[i] = comps
        while (q.isNotEmpty()) {
            val u = q.removeFirst()
            for (v in adj[u]) if (comp[v] == -1) { comp[v] = comps; q.add(v) }
        }
        comps++
    }
    var total = 0
    for (c in 0 until comps) {
        val idxMap = HashMap<Int, Int>()
        var mc = 0
        for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == c) { idxMap[i] = mc; mc++ }
        val targ = IntArray(mc)
        for ((oi, ni) in idxMap) targ[ni] = classTargets[oi]
        val masksC = ArrayList<Int>()
        val rowsC = ArrayList<IntArray>()
        for (mi in mergedM.indices) {
            val mask = mergedM[mi]
            var ok = true
            var t = mask
            var iBit = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) if (comp[iBit] != c) { ok = false; break }
                t = t ushr 1
                iBit++
            }
            if (!ok) continue
            var newMask = 0
            val list = ArrayList<Int>()
            var tt = mask
            var ii = 0
            while (tt != 0) {
                if ((tt and 1) != 0) { val ni = idxMap[ii]!!; newMask = newMask or (1 shl ni); list.add(ni) }
                tt = tt ushr 1
                ii++
            }
            masksC.add(newMask)
            rowsC.add(list.toIntArray())
        }
        val order = (0 until masksC.size).sortedByDescending { Integer.bitCount(masksC[it]) }
        val masksArr = IntArray(order.size)
        val rowsArr = Array(order.size) { IntArray(0) }
        for (k in order.indices) { masksArr[k] = masksC[order[k]]; rowsArr[k] = rowsC[order[k]] }
        val solver = CompSolver(masksArr, rowsArr, targ)
        val ans = solver.solve()
        if (ans == Int.MAX_VALUE) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        total += ans
    }
    return total
}

fun main() {
    val lines = File("input.txt").readText().trim().lines().filter { it.isNotBlank() }
    // chunk.txt format: start end (0-based inclusive indices). If missing, process all.
    var start = 0
    var end = lines.size - 1
    val cf = File("chunk.txt")
    if (cf.exists()) {
        val parts = cf.readText().trim().split(Regex("\\s+"))
        if (parts.size >= 2) {
            start = parts[0].toInt()
            end = parts[1].toInt()
        }
    }
    if (start < 0) start = 0
    if (end >= lines.size) end = lines.size - 1
    var total1 = 0
    var total2 = 0
    for (i in start..end) {
        val line = lines[i]
        val (pattern, buttons, jolts) = parseLine(line)
        total1 += mitmMinPresses(pattern, buttons)
        total2 += solveMachinePart2(buttons, jolts.toIntArray())
    }
    println("part1_chunk=$total1 part2_chunk=$total2 range=$start-$end")
    File("accum.txt").appendText("$start $end $total1 $total2\n")
}

import java.io.File
import java.util.ArrayDeque

fun parseLine(line: String): Triple<String, List<List<Int>>, List<Int>> {
    val l = line.trim()
    val m = Regex("\\s*\\[([^\\]]+)\\]\\s*(.*)\\{([^\\}]*)\\}\\s*").matchEntire(l)
        ?: throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot parse line: $line")
    val pattern = m.groupValues[1]
    val middle = m.groupValues[2]
    val joltsStr = m.groupValues[3].trim()
    val buttons = mutableListOf<List<Int>>()
    val par = Regex("\\(([^\\)]*)\\)")
    for (mt in par.findAll(middle)) {
        val s = mt.groupValues[1].trim()
        if (s.isEmpty()) buttons.add(emptyList()) else buttons.add(s.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() })
    }
    val joltages = if (joltsStr.isEmpty()) emptyList() else joltsStr.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() }
    return Triple(pattern, buttons, joltages)
}

    val right = masks.sliceArray(k until n)

    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }

        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {

        if (s.isEmpty()) buttons.add(emptyList()) else buttons.add(s.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() })
    }
    val joltages = if (joltsStr.isEmpty()) emptyList() else joltsStr.split(',').map { it.trim().toInt() }
    return Triple(pattern, buttons, joltages)
}

fun mitmMinPresses(pattern: String, buttons: List<List<Int>>): Int {
    val m = pattern.length
    var target = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (pattern[i] == '#') target = target or (1 shl i)
    val masks = IntArray(buttons.size)
    for (i in buttons.indices) {
        var mask = 0
        for (idx in buttons[i]) if (idx in 0 until m) mask = mask xor (1 shl idx)
        masks[i] = mask
    }
    val n = masks.size
    val k = n / 2
    val left = masks.sliceArray(0 until k)
    val right = masks.sliceArray(k until n)
    val mapR = HashMap<Int, Int>()
    val Rn = right.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Rn)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Rn) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor right[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val prev = mapR[x]
        if (prev == null || cnt < prev) mapR[x] = cnt
    }
    var best: Int? = null
    val Ln = left.size
    for (s in 0 until (1 shl Ln)) {
        var x = 0
        var cnt = 0
        var t = s
        var j = 0
        while (j < Ln) {
            if ((t and 1) != 0) { x = x xor left[j]; cnt++ }
            t = t ushr 1
            j++
        }
        val need = x xor target
        val r = mapR[need]
        if (r != null) {
            val total = cnt + r
            if (best == null || total < best!!) best = total
        }
    }
    return best ?: if (target == 0) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
}

private class CompSolver(private val masks: IntArray, private val rowsOf: Array<IntArray>, private val targets: IntArray) {
    private val n = masks.size
    private val m = targets.size
    private val M = 1 shl m
    private val capsSuffix: Array<IntArray> = Array(n + 1) { IntArray(M) }
    private val ct: Array<IntArray> = Array(n) { IntArray(M) }
    private val sumT: IntArray = IntArray(M)
    private val rem: IntArray = targets.clone()
    private var best = Int.MAX_VALUE

    init {
        // caps suffix and ct
        for (d in n - 1 downTo 0) {
            val cur = capsSuffix[d]
            val nxt = capsSuffix[d + 1]
            val maskB = masks[d]
            for (T in 1 until M) {
                val cov = Integer.bitCount(maskB and T)
                val v = nxt[T]
                cur[T] = if (cov > v) cov else v
            }
        }
        for (b in 0 until n) {
            val mb = masks[b]
            for (T in 1 until M) ct[b][T] = Integer.bitCount(mb and T)
        }
        // sumT initial
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            var s = 0
            var t = T
            var i = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) s += targets[i]
                t = t ushr 1
                i++
            }
            sumT[T] = s
        }
    }

    private fun allZero(): Boolean { for (x in rem) if (x != 0) return false; return true }

    private fun lb(depth: Int): Int {
        val cap = capsSuffix[depth]
        var bestLb = 0
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val s = sumT[T]
            if (s == 0) continue
            val c = cap[T]
            if (c == 0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
            val need = (s + c - 1) / c
            if (need > bestLb) bestLb = need
        }
        return bestLb
    }

    private fun apply(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] -= k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] -= c * k
        }
    }
    private fun undo(b: Int, k: Int) {
        if (k == 0) return
        for (r in rowsOf[b]) rem[r] += k
        val cb = ct[b]
        for (T in 1 until M) {
            val c = cb[T]
            if (c != 0) sumT[T] += c * k
        }
    }

    private fun dfs(depth: Int, used: Int) {
        if (used >= best) return
        if (allZero()) { if (used < best) best = used; return }
        val h = lb(depth)
        if (h == Int.MAX_VALUE) return
        if (used + h >= best) return
        if (depth == n) return
        // upper bound for this button
        var ub = Int.MAX_VALUE
        for (r in rowsOf[depth]) if (rem[r] < ub) ub = rem[r]
        if (ub == Int.MAX_VALUE) ub = 0
        var k = ub
        while (k >= 0) {
            apply(depth, k)
            dfs(depth + 1, used + k)
            undo(depth, k)
            k--
        }
    }

    fun solve(): Int { best = Int.MAX_VALUE; dfs(0, 0); return best }
}

fun solveMachinePart2(buttonsOrig: List<List<Int>>, targetsOrig: IntArray): Int {
    val m0 = targetsOrig.size
    val n0 = buttonsOrig.size
    if (m0 == 0) return 0
    // Build cover matrix
    val cover = Array(n0) { BooleanArray(m0) }
    for (b in 0 until n0) for (idx in buttonsOrig[b]) if (idx in 0 until m0) cover[b][idx] = true
    // Group rows by signature over buttons
    val sigToRows = LinkedHashMap<Long, MutableList<Int>>()
    for (i in 0 until m0) {
        var sig = 0L
        for (b in 0 until n0) if (cover[b][i]) sig = sig or (1L shl b)
        sigToRows.computeIfAbsent(sig) { ArrayList() }.add(i)
    }
    val m = sigToRows.size
    val classTargets = IntArray(m)
    val sigList = ArrayList<Long>(m)
    var ci = 0
    for ((sig, rows) in sigToRows) {
        sigList.add(sig)
        val t0 = targetsOrig[rows[0]]
        for (r in rows) if (targetsOrig[r] != t0) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        classTargets[ci] = t0
        ci++
    }
    // Forbid buttons touching zero-target classes
    var forbid = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] == 0) forbid = forbid or (1 shl i)
    // Build button masks over classes, keep those not touching forbidden
    val maskList = ArrayList<Int>()
    val rowsList = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (b in 0 until n0) {
        var msk = 0
        for ((idxSig, sig) in sigList.withIndex()) if (((sig ushr b) and 1L) != 0L) msk = msk or (1 shl idxSig)
        if (msk == 0) continue
        if ((msk and forbid) != 0) continue
        val list = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var j = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) list.add(j); t = t ushr 1; j++ }
        maskList.add(msk)
        rowsList.add(list.toIntArray())
    }
    // Feasibility: every positive class must be coverable
    for (i in 0 until m) if (classTargets[i] > 0) {
        var any = false
        for (msk in maskList) if (((msk ushr i) and 1) != 0) { any = true; break }
        if (!any) return Int.MAX_VALUE
    }
    if (maskList.isEmpty()) return if (classTargets.all { it == 0 }) 0 else Int.MAX_VALUE
    // Merge duplicate masks
    val seen = LinkedHashMap<Int, Int>()
    val mergedM = ArrayList<Int>()
    val mergedR = ArrayList<IntArray>()
    for (idxBtn in maskList.indices) {
        val msk = maskList[idxBtn]
        if (!seen.containsKey(msk)) { seen[msk] = mergedM.size; mergedM.add(msk); mergedR.add(rowsList[idxBtn]) }
    }
    // Build connectivity among classes
    val adj = Array(m) { ArrayList<Int>() }
    for (msk in mergedM) {
        val bits = ArrayList<Int>()
        var t = msk
        var i = 0
        while (t != 0) { if ((t and 1) != 0) bits.add(i); t = t ushr 1; i++ }
        for (a in 0 until bits.size) for (b in a + 1 until bits.size) { val u = bits[a]; val v = bits[b]; adj[u].add(v); adj[v].add(u) }
    }
    // BFS components
    val comp = IntArray(m) { -1 }
    var comps = 0
    for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == -1) {
        val q = ArrayDeque<Int>()
        q.add(i)
        comp[i] = comps
        while (q.isNotEmpty()) {
            val u = q.removeFirst()
            for (v in adj[u]) if (comp[v] == -1) { comp[v] = comps; q.add(v) }
        }
        comps++
    }
    var total = 0
    for (c in 0 until comps) {
        val idxMap = HashMap<Int, Int>()
        var mc = 0
        for (i in 0 until m) if (comp[i] == c) { idxMap[i] = mc; mc++ }
        val targ = IntArray(mc)
        for ((oi, ni) in idxMap) targ[ni] = classTargets[oi]
        val masksC = ArrayList<Int>()
        val rowsC = ArrayList<IntArray>()
        for (mi in mergedM.indices) {
            val mask = mergedM[mi]
            var ok = true
            var t = mask
            var iBit = 0
            while (t != 0) {
                if ((t and 1) != 0) if (comp[iBit] != c) { ok = false; break }
                t = t ushr 1
                iBit++
            }
            if (!ok) continue
            var newMask = 0
            val list = ArrayList<Int>()
            var tt = mask
            var ii = 0
            while (tt != 0) {
                if ((tt and 1) != 0) { val ni = idxMap[ii]!!; newMask = newMask or (1 shl ni); list.add(ni) }
                tt = tt ushr 1
                ii++
            }
            masksC.add(newMask)
            rowsC.add(list.toIntArray())
        }
        val order = (0 until masksC.size).sortedByDescending { Integer.bitCount(masksC[it]) }
        val masksArr = IntArray(order.size)
        val rowsArr = Array(order.size) { IntArray(0) }
        for (k in order.indices) { masksArr[k] = masksC[order[k]]; rowsArr[k] = rowsC[order[k]] }
        val solver = CompSolver(masksArr, rowsArr, targ)
        val ans = solver.solve()
        if (ans == Int.MAX_VALUE) return Int.MAX_VALUE
        total += ans
    }
    return total
}

fun main() {
    val lines = File("input.txt").readText().trim().lines().filter { it.isNotBlank() }
    // chunk.txt format: start end (0-based inclusive indices). If missing, process all.
    var start = 0
    var end = lines.size - 1
    val cf = File("chunk.txt")
    if (cf.exists()) {
        val parts = cf.readText().trim().split(Regex("\\s+"))
        if (parts.size >= 2) {
            start = parts[0].toInt()
            end = parts[1].toInt()
        }
    }
    if (start < 0) start = 0
    if (end >= lines.size) end = lines.size - 1
    var total1 = 0
    var total2 = 0
    for (i in start..end) {
        val line = lines[i]
        val (pattern, buttons, jolts) = parseLine(line)
        total1 += mitmMinPresses(pattern, buttons)
        total2 += solveMachinePart2(buttons, jolts.toIntArray())
    }
    println("part1_chunk=$total1 part2_chunk=$total2 range=$start-$end")
    File("accum.txt").appendText("$start $end $total1 $total2\n")
}

fun parseLine(line: String): Triple<String, List<List<Int>>, List<Int>> {
    val l = line.trim()
    val m = Regex("\\s*\\[([^\\]]+)\\]\\s*(.*)\\{([^\\}]*)\\}\\s*").matchEntire(l)
        ?: throw IllegalArgumentException("Cannot parse line: $line")
    val pattern = m.groupValues[1]
